LightningComponentBundle.description: A component that allows for embedding a quick/shortcut inside a flow to Print the page. This emulates the same approach as pressing File/Print within a browser.

property.name: buttonLabel
property.label: Button Label
property.description: This is the label for the print button, it is never displayed on screen but does appear when someone hovers over the button.

property.name: buttonAssistiveText
property.label: Button Assistive Text
property.description: Assistive text for the button, this is read by screen readers when a user tabs between items on screen and should be descriptive of the action.

property.name: buttonFloat
property.label: Button Float
property.description: Populate this with slds-float_left, slds-float_right or leave blank to position the button on screen.
